EmailTemplate.description: Email that is sent when a case is created.
EmailTemplate.name: Your request has been received
EmailTemplate.subject: Your request has been received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Level Shoes Guest Services.
We have received your request and a support case has been logged.
Case# {!Case.CaseNumber}
One of our service agents will be in touch with you soon.
If you require urgent support please call us on:
+971 800 LEVEL SD (+971 800 53835 73)
Opening hours: Daily 10am - 10pm
Regards,
Level Shoes
